text:
[Verse]
Sunrise in the morning
New day comes without a warning
Feet hit the ground I'm soaring
Heart beats loud and roaring

[Verse 2]
Sky's so blue and bright
Feel the rush with every stride
Wind in my hair no fight
Running wild side by side

[Chorus]
We're running running wild
Free like a restless child
No chains to hold us down
We're kings without a crown

[Verse 3]
Road ahead is calling
No fear of us falling
Step by step we're all in
Never once we're stalling

[Bridge]
Feel the earth beneath us
Every step with purpose
World spins and completes us
Love the journey trust us

[Chorus]
We're running running wild
Free like a restless child
No chains to hold us down
We're kings without a crown
title: Running Wild
